reviews.review_msg: He can efficiently communicate his knowledge of finance and economics with his students. I never felt like missing his lectures even on my off days. Great Prof!

AMAZING prof, and he really cares about his students. Stuffs that I learned form this class with Emrul can also be applied in real life. For example, Emrul gives valuable advices on selecting and buying mutual funds from his own investment experience.

Great lecturer, very helpful and interesting. I recommend taking any course he teaches because his real world experience is shared and applied to what are usually boring topics. Enjoyed the class but it did require some hard work
